title: The Amazon Rainforest
itunes:title: The Amazon Rainforest
description:
In this episode, the team discusses the Amazon Rainforest with President and Exec Director at Earth Innovation Institute and "tree-killing ecologist", Daniel Nepstad.

Go to EarthInnovation.org to learn more!

Our merch store is now live! Go to idontknowaboutthat.com for shirts, hoodies, mugs, and more!

Subscribe to our Patreon at patreon.com/IDKAT for ad free episodes, bonus episodes, and more exclusive perks! Tiers start at just $2!
